blogPost.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
blogPost.body: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
blogPost.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Hyper是一款专为游戏玩家和动漫迷打造的动漫语音聊天应用。与人见面，语音聊天，不用担心露出真面目。我们给你提供绘画、语音聊天等工具。花费的时间越多，赚取的金币越多，可以获得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交网络为人们进入游戏和动漫。

localize.description: Hyper是一款專爲遊戲玩家和動漫迷打造的動漫語音聊天應用。與人見面，語音聊天，不用擔心露出真面目。我們給你提供繪畫、語音聊天等工具。花費的時間越多，賺取的金幣越多，可以獲得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交網絡爲人們進入遊戲和動漫。

previous.excerpt: 💸 Z1 is a digital bank for teenagers in LatAm, where they can spend and receive money through a prepaid Mastercard credit card. Z1 gives teenagers autonomy and teaches them financial literacy from their first contact with money all throughout their adulthood✨
previous.title: Z1 - Digital bank for teenagers in Latam

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的数字银行，他们可以通过预付万事达卡信用卡消费和收款。Z1给予青少年自主权，并教会他们从第一次接触金钱到整个成年后的金融知识✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脱维亚青少年数字银行

localize.description: 💸 Z1是拉丁美洲青少年的數字銀行，他們可以通過預付萬事達卡信用卡消費和收款。Z1給予青少年自主權，並教會他們從第一次接觸金錢到整個成年後的金融知識✨。
localize.tagline: 拉脫維亞青少年數字銀行

next.excerpt: With Crove app you can create your repetitive business documents as intelligent templates that use variables and logical conditions.
next.title: Crove - Automate your repetitive business documents

localize.description: 通过Crove应用，您可以将重复性的业务文档创建为使用变量和逻辑条件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自动化您的重复性业务文件

localize.description: 通過Crove應用，您可以將重複性的業務文檔創建爲使用變量和邏輯條件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自動化您的重複性業務文件
